version_description:
- Added a new edit feature as IAP. Instead of cropping a photo beforehand, you can now do it right in Veracity, saving you a lot of time!
- When tapping an item in the search results, you can choose which browser to open the link in.
- The clipboard option now recognizes most image URLs, so you can either copy the image itself, or a link to the image.
- Reduced average network usage by 20%.
- Fixed a couple bugs when selecting PNG images with transparency.

â—† If you find Veracity useful, please consider leaving a positive review! Thanks :)

- Fixed a few crashes.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.
- Fixed a bug in the search algorithm.

- This update adds experimental search results for the content of your photos. If Veracity cannot find an exact match for a photo, it will attempt to identify its contents. Currently, the results may be generic, such as "dog" or "cat", but they should improve over time! You can opt-in to this feature from the settings.
- Added "visually similar images" to the search results. They are presented below any exact matches found.
- Optimized the networking code to make some searches much faster.

- Fixed a visual glitch when scrolling horizontally in the search results.
- Fixed a couple crashes.

- Updated for iOS 10.
- Improved "best guess" results in many cases.
- Speed improvements for searching.

- Fixed some issues with in-app purchases.
- Fixed a couple crashes, including one that could occur when the Edit tool was activated.
- Results are tappable again on devices without 3D Touch.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- Bug fixes and performance improvements.
